1. Here’s a gift for you — a FREE ticket to try Live.me’s NEW Crane Game! Flex your skills and play today.
2. Fuel your competitive side with Live.me’s new Head2Head game. You can choose to play against your friends now and earn diamonds while you do it!
3. Head2Head just got a makeover so give it another try. Trust us, more fun is headed your way with this update!

1. Introducing Premiun Spin in Spin-2-Win, premium gifts added on the wheel that you may win

3. Board is added so that you can display it in your broadcast.

Update：

- New PK ranking list, go H2H more and get more points!
- New Super Admin in live (BLv ≥ 30)! As a Super Admin, you can block and mute users, receive free gifts and etc. Normal Admin can set up default replies now!
- Allow to view real-time audience list in the live room!
- Live End page by broadcaster side is upgraded in an all-round way, with personalized guidance to improve the quality of your live!
- New content tags on Featured page, find more talented broadcasters!
- More countries options on the World page, page display optimized!
- High-level entrance effects updated!
- Fan tag updated to Fans Group! New Group Ranking! Root for your favorite broadcasters!
Bug fixes and performance improvements. The best live-streaming app just got better!

-Interaction section button at bottom part in broadcast room upgraded!
-New data tracking, now you can always know your broadcast status!
-With new online customer service system, you can give feedback quickly.
-Broadcast ranking optimized!
Bug fixes and performance improvements. The best live-streaming app just got better!

-Launched higher broadcaster levels. More privileges for broadcasters. C'mon in and start broadcasting!
-Added invisible status in Message. Hide your online status from others when needed
-Brand new audio room coming! Added funny emojis and interesting games. The exciting "Draw something" game is waiting for you. Let's Rock n' Roll!
-Check out your internet connection any time, show your charm clearly
-Bug fixes and performance improvements. The best live-streaming app just got better!

1. [Kingdom]We are introducing a new kingdom gift "Supreme Warrior", and all kingdoms reaching Silver Tribe will have the right to unlock it! We have also lowered the requirement to unlock "raindrop" - now all kingdoms reaching Golden Clan level will be able to use them.
2. You can now submit images and pictures to appeal.
Bug fixes and performance improvements. The best live-streaming app just got better!

- New content tags on Featured page, find more talented broadcasters!
- More countries options on the World page, page display optimized!
- High-level entrance effects updated!
- Fan tag updated to Fans Group! New Group Ranking! Root for your favorite broadcasters!

Don’t miss out the exclusive birthday celebration broadcast! LiveMe is holding online party for you with best birthday surprise! Celebrate your birthday with us or make birthday wishes to your favorite broadcasters!

Update：

- New PK ranking list, go H2H more and get more points!
- New Super Admin in live (BLv ≥ 30)! As a Super Admin, you can block and mute users, receive free gifts and etc. Normal Admin can set up default replies now!
- Allow to view real-time audience list in the live room!
- Live End page by broadcaster side is upgraded in an all-round way, with personalized guidance to improve the quality of your live!
- New content tags on Featured page, find more talented broadcasters!
- More countries options on the World page, page display optimized!
- High-level entrance effects updated!
- Fan tag updated to Fans Group! New Group Ranking! Root for your favorite broadcasters!
